description: Over a year has gone by since we last saw Sasha. When she wrote and asked to come back how could we say no? Sasha is sexy, tan, and built, however the best part is that she is tough. She never asks how long she is going to be tied up. She never whines about anything, actually. She takes on each tie as a personal challenge, and does what it takes for a good scene. Sasha, you're golden, you can come back anytime you want.
title: Sasha Sparks
